name: DemonSlayer (Cyberq)
description:
This game is an Action Puzzle

This is a Match 3 game with a Twist! you fight with the enemy by solving the puzzle 

If a wrong move is made then the enemy will try to kill you 

You shoot the enemy by solving the puzzle, the more you shoot our combo will be more powerful puzzle changes its pattern after every few minutes be quick! and slay some demons

The theme of the game is inspired by Doom series
